channel.title: Making a NPC attack another NPC?
channel.description:
[b]Problem: [/b]Making a NPC attack another NPC?
[b]Server base:[/b] Testscape.
how would you go about doing this...any ex-sample would be appericated.

item.title: Making a NPC attack another NPC?
item.dc:creator: @BamBam BamBam
item.description:
@BamBam wrote:

Well, I’ve been looking around to find some sort of ex-sample, apparently Daniel has created one, but he couldn’t get it to continue attacking after the NPC has died.

Java, thats a good idea. However, what i “was” trying to accomplish was, i have created a area in my server where theres NPC standing around, chanting outside this ring, and in the middle of this ring theres two NPC’s. which run around in this area. i was gonna get those 2 NPCS to fight each other, so i have a Gladiator type Arena, where the NPCS attack other NPCS in the arena and the Players can Attack the Players, all i need to add is attacking NPC’s and ill be completed.

Read full topic
